00075 #define BEGIN_STATE_MAP                             \
00076 public:                                             \
00077 virtual const StateStruct* GetStateMap() {          \
00078     static const StateStruct StateMap[] = {
00079 
00081 #define STATE_MAP_ENTRY(entry)                      \
00082     { (StateFunc)(entry) },
00083 
00085 #define END_STATE_MAP                               \
00086     { (StateFunc)0 }                                \
00087     };                                              \
00088     return &StateMap[0]; }
